channel.title: CPU on Jinwoo Park Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CPU on Jinwoo Park Blog

item.title: Raising Suspicions of QC/Design Flaws Causing Intermittent Resets/Freezes in ZEN 2/3
item.description: It has been quite a while since ZEN4 started selling, and ZEN3 has also gone through several internal stepping/revision changes that seem to have improved things, so I feel this is an appropriate time to write this article. I originally posted this on other communities as well, and while it may seem tangential to development, it deals with CPU internals, so I am reposting it on my dev blog.
